title: How do I send a multimedia message?
answer:
1. Go to Messaging and touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111066). 

 1. Enter the recipient and write the message. 

 1. Touch Menu then Add subject. The message is then converted into a multimedia message. 

 1. Touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111067) to attach images, audio clips, or videos to the message. 

 1. [Touch Send.]()
